description.en: For this challenge you will need a book. Your task is to build a robot that can turn the pages of your book. Try to turn as many pages as possible within 1 minute.

Put the book down the floor.
Open it in the middle before starting the challenge.
You have got 3 trials.

You managed to turn 3 pages. = Good job! Let's try again.
You managed to turn 4-6 pages. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You managed to turn 7+ pages. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You managed to turn 3 pages. = 5 points
You managed to turn 4-6 pages. = 10 points
You managed to turn 7+ pages. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
